result.arabic_text: فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: 11.Tónna hinnay tama koros Yallak kalah aqbudak sugtem cabbaay kaa inkittossuuy salat soolissiiy zaka acuyyu heenik toysa usun sin tooboko Tslaam diinil, aayoota tamannal baxxaqqa hayna yaaxigeeh edde yantifiqe marah.
